properties.Descriptio: Area of the Oya near the Boragasketiya bridge
properties.Observatio: There are  apala trees at some places on both sides of the bank. But banks are eroded. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams, and in some places, reserved lands are being misused.
properties.Descript_1:
Paving available stone in the river banks and Planting trees

Dry rubble packing (with locally found rubble, size over 225mm )

Stream / canal  reservation protection by earth filling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m

Vegetative
